entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 05:06 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure: 98.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: S 30 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15 except minus 19 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15 except minus 19 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
